name: Utility
description:
This is the script which duplicates current  text in current file vertically. 

Play with beautymargin variable to get desired indentation. 

can be executed using  command  :call ColCopy()
and you will see that it performs vertical copy.
install_details: Copy the content of file using CRTL-C or mouse and paste it with VIMRC file.

versions.release_notes: margin being calculated based upon length of longest line rather then fixed.
